0.name: Ant & Dec
0.fame: This duo made their names in Byker Grove, playing PJ & Duncan. They're now very successful TV presenters!

1.name: Rowan Atkinson
1.connection: He was born in Newcastle in 1955, and studied Electrical Engineering at Newcastle University
1.fame: Actor & comedian, know for Mr Bean, Blackadder, and Johnny English.

2.name: Cheryl
2.connection: Born in Newcastle in 1983, she grown up in Walker
2.fame: Coming to fame through Girls Aloud, she's gone on to have a very successful solo career. You may have also seen her when she's appeared as a judge on The X Factor over the years.
